summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from Admiral Way to West Spokane Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners 100% Limit Petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 193385, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
